channel.title: Help with npc shops?
channel.description:
alright so, after a few weeks of running my server i notice some players maging the shops and putting them out of the bank so they can "lure" or.. try to piss me off...
anyone have any idea how to fix it to where players cant mage or any kind of attack them?

item.title: Help with npc shops?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

well in your mage methods make it so when maging on npc’s, they cant mage certain one’s. Attacknpc() i believe.

Read full topic
